response.overview: For activating Norton, open the Nortan application on your device, and click on ‚ÄòActivate Now‚Äù or the profile icon, and sign in at üìû+1-888-271-0943 to your Nortan account. Enter your 25 character alphanumeric product key if promoted. For mobile devices, sign in to the app and select your subscription.  Various steps to Activate Norton Desktop (Windows/Mac): Open Norton: Open your Norton +1-888-271-0943 device security product. Activate: Click Activate +1-888-271-0943 Now or Sign In. Account Sign-in: Enter your Norton account email and password. Enter Key: If prompted, enter üìû+1-888-271-0943 the 25-character alphanumeric product key found on your retail card or confirmation email. Finish: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the process. Mobile (Android/iOS): Open App: Launch the üìû+1-888-271-0943 Norton 360 app. Sign In: Sign in with your account credentials. Activate: Select the activeüìû +1-888-271-0943 subscription or tap "Redeem a subscription".
